trait.name: Brave
entries: The wolf pack leader has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf pack leader has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolf pack leader has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pin Down
entries: The wolf pack leader can attempt to grapple a creature as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The wolf pack leader moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five wolves that can see and hear the wolf pack leader can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The wolf pack leader makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Howl (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each hostile creature within 30 feet of the wolf pack leader that can hear its howl must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the wolf pack leader's next turn.

trait.name: Archer's Eye
entries: As a bonus action, the warlord can mark one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. This mark lasts for 1 minute, ending early if the warlord marks another target. When the warlord or one of its allies makes an attack roll against a marked target, it can roll a {@dice d6} and add the number rolled to the attack roll.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The warlord has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the warlord can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the warlord is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the warlord instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The warlord deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the warlord that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the warlord doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warlord makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Volley
entries: The warlord makes a ranged attack against any number of creatures within 10 feet of a point it can see within its weapon's range.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: When an enemy ends its turn within 5 feet of the warlord, the warlord can move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The warlord halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The warlord must be able to see the attacker.

legendary.name: Quick Step
entries: The warlord moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: Up to five allies that can see and hear the warlord can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The warlord makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The warlord makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Command Allies (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The warlord targets up to three allies it can see within 60 feet of it. If a target can see and hear the warlord, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Cheap Shot (1/Turn)
entries: The thug boss deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thug boss that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the thug boss doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll. If a creature takes any of this extra damage, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the thug boss' next turn.

trait.name: Discern Lies
entries: The thug boss knows when it hears a creature speak a lie in a language it knows.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The thug boss can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The thug boss has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug boss' allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thug boss makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature the thug boss can see targets it with an attack, the thug boss chooses an ally within 5 feet of it. The two creatures swap places, and the chosen ally becomes the target instead.

legendary.name: Apprehend
entries: One ally that can see and hear the thug boss can use its reaction to attempt to grapple one creature within its reach.

legendary.name: Shove
entries: The thug boss attempts to shove one creature within its reach.

legendary.name: Leadership (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Until the end of the thug boss' next turn, each ally of the thug boss' choice that can see the thug boss can add a {@dice d4} to each of their attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. This effect ends if the thug boss is {@condition incapacitated}.

legendary.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The thug boss targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of thug boss' next turn.

monster.name: Supreme Warlord

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The warlord can take an extra action on its turn.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
entries: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once on each of its turns, the warlord can deal an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the warlord that isn't {@condition incapacitated}. The warlord can also force the creature to make a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Rally
entries: While the warlord isn't {@condition incapacitated}, each ally of the warlord within 60 feet of it can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and can add a {@dice d4} to each of their attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the warlord can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Survivor
entries: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

trait.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The warlord has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warlord makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Hold the Line
entries: The warlord can make one melee weapon attack against a creature that enters its reach, exits its reach, or moves 5 or more feet while within its reach. If the attack hits, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the current turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The warlord adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the warlord must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendaryHeader: The warlord can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The warlord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The warlord moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five allies that can see and hear the warlord can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the warlord, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The warlord makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The warlord makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Frighten Foes (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The warlord targets up to five creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the warlord until the end of the warlord's next turn. Any target within 5 feet of the warlord has disadvantage on the saving throw.

monster.name: Squadron Leader

trait.name: Formation Tactics
entries: The squadron leader and each ally within 30 feet of it has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition restrained} while within 5 feet of at least one ally.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The squadron leader can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the squadron leader that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Master of Tactics
entries: The squadron leader can take the Help action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The squadron leader makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

legendaryHeader: The squadron leader can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The squadron leader regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The squadron leader moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five allies that can see and hear the squadron leader can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The squadron leader targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the squadron leader, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The squadron leader makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Defensive Position (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Until the end of the squadron leader's next turn, each ally of its choice that can see the squadron leader can roll a {@dice d4} whenever an attack hits it or whenever it makes a saving throw. The number rolled is subtracted from the attack roll or is added to the saving throw total.

monster.name: Skull Overlord
languages: all the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The skull overlord is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). The skull overlord knows the following spells:

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the skull overlord is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the skull overlord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless the skull overlord is {@condition incapacitated}, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Master of the Grave
entries: While within 60 feet of the skull overlord, any undead ally of the skull overlord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains {@dice 1d6} hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skull overlord makes three bone sword attacks.

action.name: Bone Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: The skull overlord targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The skull overlord regains a number of hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The skull overlord moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Alternatively, up to five undead that can see and hear the skull overlord can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Bolster Undead
entries: The skull overlord targets up to five undead it can see within 60 feet of it. Each undead gain 15 ({@dice 2d8 + 6}) temporary hit points.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The skull overlord casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Command Undead (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Up to five undead that can hear and see the skull overlord can each use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Life Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The skull overlord uses its Life Drain.

legendary.name: Summon Undead (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Up to five {@creature minotaur skeleton|mm|minotaur skeletons} or {@creature ogre zombie|mm|ogre zombies} appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the skull overlord and remain until destroyed. Undead summoned in this way roll initiative and act in the next available turn. The skull overlord can have up to ten undead summoned by this ability at a time.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The commander is a 8th-level spellcaster. Its innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
entries: The commander rerolls a failed saving throw. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Rally the Troops
entries: As a bonus action, the commander can use psionics to end the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Victory Before Battle (3/Day)
entries: When the commander rolls initiative, it can grant itself and up to five creatures of its choice within 120 feet of it a +10 bonus to initiative.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The commander makes two weapon attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Psychic Disruption.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Psychic Disruption
entries: One creature within 120 feet of the commander must make a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage, and the first time it makes an attack roll or ability check before the end of the commander's next turn, it must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the total.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The commander teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Commander's Sight
entries: The commander chooses one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. Until the start of the commander's turn, the commander's allies have advantage on attack rolls against that target.

legendary.name: Command Ally (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The commander targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. The ally can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The commander casts an innate spell.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The narzugon is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Death in Hellfire
entries: When the narzugon kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a {@creature lemure} in Avernus in {@dice 1d4} hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, only a {@spell wish} spell or killing the lemure and casting {@spell true resurrection} on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Diabolical Sense
entries: The narzugon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive good-aligned creatures.

trait.name: Infernal Command
entries: While the narzugon isn't {@condition incapacitated}, each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and can add a {@dice d4} to each of their attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

trait.name: Infernal Tack
entries: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of {@item infernal tack|MTF}, which allow it to summon its {@creature nightmare} companion.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The narzugon's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Mounted Combatant
entries: The narzugon can force an attack targeted at its mount to target it instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The narzugon makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Hellfire Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) piercing damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Terrifying Command
entries: Each creature that isn't a fiend within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of it for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that makes a successful saving throw is immune to this narzugon's Terrifying Command for 24 hours.

action.name: Heal (1/Day)
entries: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains up to 100 hit points.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The narzugon or its mount moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five allies that can see and hear the narguzon can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Hellfire Sweep (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The narzugon sweeps its lance, unleashing hellfire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Terrifying Command (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The narzugon uses its Terrifying Command.

monster.name: Mummy Warlord
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
entries: The mummy warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mummy warlord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless the mummy warlord is {@condition incapacitated}, it and any other undead creature within 60 feet of it has advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Master of the Grave
entries: While within 60 feet of the mummy warlord, any undead ally of the mummy warlord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains {@dice 1d6} hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

trait.name: Mummy Rot
entries: When the mummy warlord hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell remove curse} spell or other magic. On a successful save, a creature is immune to this effect until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: A destroyed mummy warlord gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the mummy warlord's heart.

trait.name: Unholy Weapons
entries: The mummy warlord's weapon attacks are magical. When the mummy warlord hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 4d8} necrotic damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mummy warlord can use its Dreadful Glare and makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The mummy warlord targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy lord, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the mummy warlord's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralyzed} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies, mummy lords, and mummy warlords for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The mummy warlord moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five undead that can see and hear the mummy warlord can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The mummy lord makes one weapon attack or uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary.name: Blinding Dust
entries: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy warlord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy warlord must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the creature's next turn.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The mummy warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the mummy warlord, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Apprehend (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Up to five undead that can see and hear the mummy warlord can each use their reactions to attempt to grapple one creature within their reach. The undead can all grapple the same target or can split their grapples between different targets.

legendary.name: Whirlwind of Sand (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The mummy warlord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the mummy warlord is immune to all damage, and it can't be {@condition grappled}, {@condition petrified}, knocked {@condition prone}, {@condition restrained}, or {@condition stunned}. Equipment worn or carried by the mummy warlord remain in its possession.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The guard captain has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Alert
entries: The guard captain has advantage on initiative rolls, and it can't be surprised while it is conscious.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guard captain makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The guard captain moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five guards that can see and hear the guard captain can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Apprehend
entries: One guard that can see and hear the guard captain can use its reaction to attempt to grapple one creature within its reach.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The guard captain makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Leadership (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Until the end of the guard captain's next turn, each guard of the guard captain's choice that can see the guard captain can add a {@dice d4} to each of their attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. This effect ends if the guard captain is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The warlord can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warlord makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The warlord or its mount moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five goblins that can see and hear the warlord can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The warlord targets one goblin it can see within 30 feet of it. If the goblin can see and hear the warlord, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Leadership (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Until the end of the warlord's next turn, each goblin of the warlord's choice that can see the warlord can add a {@dice d4} to each of their attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. This effect ends if the warlord is {@condition incapacitated}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The death knight is a 20th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Dread Lord
entries: While within 60 feet of the death knight, any ally of the death knight makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains {@dice 1d6} hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the death knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The death knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless the death knight is {@condition incapacitated}, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it are immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The death knight makes three flail attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Hellfire Orb {@recharge}
entries: The death knight hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage plus 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Dreadful Aspect
entries: The death knight exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the death knight must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If a {@condition frightened} target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the death knight, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the death knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The death knight or its mount moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five allies that can see and hear the death knight can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Apprehend (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Up to five allies that can see and hear the death knight can each use their reactions to attempt to grapple one creature within their reach. The allies can all grapple the same target or can split their grapples between different targets.

legendary.name: Dreadful Aspect (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The death knight uses Dreadful Aspect.

legendary.name: Flail (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The death knight makes one flail attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone knight makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The bone knight moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five undead that can see and hear the bone knight can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Apprehend (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Up to five undead that can see and hear the bone knight can each use their reactions to attempt to grapple one creature within their reach. The undead can all grapple the same target or can split their grapples between different targets.

legendary.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The bone knight targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of bone knight's next turn.

monster.name: Barbarian Leader

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the barbarian leader can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the barbarian leader is wearing no armor, its AC includes its Constitution modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The barbarian leader makes one weapon attack and uses Rallying Cry.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rallying Cry
entries: The barbarian leader chooses one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the ally can see or hear the barbarian leader, it gains 10 temporary hit points and can't be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

legendaryHeader: The barbarian leader can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The barbarian leader regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The barbarian leader moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Rallying Cry
entries: The barbarian leader uses Rallying Cry.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The barbarian leader makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The barbarian leader targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the barbarian leader, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction.

legendary.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The barbarian leader targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of barbarian leader's next turn.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The banneret rerolls a failed saving throw. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once on each of its turns, the banneret can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the banneret that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Rally
entries: While the banneret isn't {@condition incapacitated}, it and allies within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The banneret makes three weapon attacks and uses Battlefield Inspiration or Rallying Cry.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Battlefield Inspiration
entries: The banneret chooses up to three allies it can see within 30 feet of it. Until the end of the banneret's next turn, each target can add a {@dice d4} to its attack rolls and saving throws.

action.name: Rallying Cry
entries: The banneret chooses one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the ally can see or hear the banneret, it gains 15 temporary hit points and can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Bulwark
entries: When an ally within 30 feet of the banneret fails a saving throw, the banneret can expend one use of Indomitable to allow the ally to reroll the saving throw.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The banneret moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to three allies that can see and hear the banneret can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The banneret targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the banneret, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The banneret makes a weapon attack.

trait.name: Aura of Slaughter
entries: Unless the general is {@condition incapacitated}, each ally within 30 feet of it can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} and has advantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The general has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The general deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Unbreakable (3/Day)
entries: If the general is {@condition incapacitated} at the start of its turn, the effect causing this condition immediately ends on the general.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The general makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Demonic Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Advance
entries: The general moves up to its speed. Alternatively, up to five allies that can see and hear the general can use their reactions to move up to half their speeds.

legendary.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The general targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of general's next turn.

legendary.name: Overwhelming Assault (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Up to five allies that can hear and see the general can each use their reactions to make one weapon attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bolster
entries: While within 30 feet of the <$name$>, any ally of the <$name$> makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains 1d6 hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Inspiring Presence
entries: While the <$name$> isn't incapacitated, any ally within 30 feet of the <$name$> can't be frightened, and that ally gains temporary hit points equal to the <$name$>'s Charisma modifier whenever it starts its turn there.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Master of Tactics
entries: The <$name$> can take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rally
entries: While the <$name$> isn't incapacitated, each ally of the <$name$> within 30 feet of it can't be charmed or frightened.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.
